xxl.core.util.metaData
Class MetaDataProviders

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.metaData.MetaDataProviders

public class MetaDataProviders
extends java.lang.Object

The class MetaDataProviders contains various static methods for accessing the metadata of a metadata provider.

See Also:
MetaDataProvider

Method Detail

getMetaDataFragment

public static <I,M> M getMetaDataFragment(MetaDataProvider<? extends CompositeMetaData<? super I,? extends M>> metaDataProvider,
                                          I identifier)
Returns the metadata fragment of the given metadata provider's metadata according to the specified identifier.

Type Parameters:
I - the type of the identifiers.
M - the type of the metadata fragments.
Parameters:
metaDataProvider - the metadata provider containing the desired metadata fragment.
identifier - the identifier with which the desired metadata fragment is associated.
Returns:
the metadata fragment of the given metadata provider's metadata according to the specified identifier.
